short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily import profiles from linkedin in to Cimple

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cimple extension allows logged-in Cimple users to:
 - import your candidates directly from Linkedin from profile and research results pages
 - qualify them with #tags to leverage the power of Cimple's search and filter features
 - follow the whole recruitment process from sourcing to hiring with Cimple, a tool that is both easy to use and adapts to your needs.
